query:
SELECT
            de.tick,
            de.message_type,
            de.message,
            de.player_id as "small_id: i16",
            de.gold_amount,
            ply.client_id,
            ply.name
        FROM
            analysis_1.display_events de
            JOIN analysis_1.players ply
                ON de.game_id = ply.game_id
                AND de.player_id = ply.small_id
        WHERE
            de.game_id = $1::bpchar(8)
        ORDER BY tick, player_id
